FOUND IN: Dale – an old term for a valley which conveys the idea of it being open and possibly rolling.
Giants (various mythologies, including Greek and Norse)
Dhurrie - Although not exclusively cotton and more often woolen or silk, some dhurries can be made from cotton and are traditional flat floor rugs in India.
Jostle (move roughly and noisily causing things to knock together)

CLUE: Apt or witty remark - in France
